title: Remove storefront logo and apply red → purple → orange gradient to 'Game Vault' text

requirements.summary: Remove the logo image/icon from the Navigation component so only the 'Game Vault' text brand name appears in the navbar
acceptanceCriteria: No logo image or icon is rendered in the Navigation bar
The 'Game Vault' text brand name remains visible in the navbar
Layout remains intact and does not collapse or misalign after logo removal

file_operations.description: Remove the logo image element (likely referencing frontend/public/assets/generated/gamevault-logo.dim_400x120.png) from the Navigation component. Keep only the 'Game Vault' text brand name in the navbar. Ensure the remaining text element maintains proper spacing and alignment without the logo.

requirements.summary: Apply a 3-tone CSS linear gradient (red → purple → orange) to the 'Game Vault' site name text everywhere it appears using background-clip text technique
acceptanceCriteria: The 'Game Vault' text in the Navigation bar displays a red → purple → orange gradient across its characters
The 'Game Vault' text in the Footer displays the same red → purple → orange gradient
The 'Game Vault' text in the LoadingScreen3D displays the same red → purple → orange gradient
All three tone stops (red, purple, orange) are visually distinguishable in the gradient
The gradient is applied consistently — same direction and color stops — across all instances
Plain white or single-color fallback is not used anywhere the site name appears

file_operations.description: Add a reusable CSS utility class (e.g., .brand-gradient-text) that applies a linear gradient from red to purple to orange using background-clip: text and -webkit-background-clip: text with transparent text color. Use specific color values like linear-gradient(90deg, #ff0000 0%, #800080 50%, #ffa500 100%) to ensure all three tones are visibly distinct. This class will be applied to all 'Game Vault' text instances.
Apply the brand-gradient-text CSS class to the 'Game Vault' text element in the Navigation bar to render the red → purple → orange gradient on the brand name characters.
Apply the brand-gradient-text CSS class to the 'Game Vault' text element in the Footer component to render the red → purple → orange gradient on the brand name characters.
Apply the brand-gradient-text CSS class to the 'Game Vault' intro/title text element in the LoadingScreen3D component to render the red → purple → orange gradient on the brand name characters.
